task.title: Viewing XA transaction information by using the
task.shortdesc: Use the Transactions monitor to view information about XA transaction branches in .

context.p: You can view state information relating to XA transaction branches in by using the , or by using . For more information about using to view such state information, see .

step.cmd: Click Refresh to generate the output in the Transactions table.
You can limit the number of clients that are added to the table by selecting an value of 10, 25, 50, or 100. The default value is 10.
Enter a value into Filter, and click Apply Filter, and then click Refresh to change the visibility of the MQTT client data that is shown in the table.

result.p: The Transactions table is updated to display the results of the query and any filter that is applied to those results.
